CustomField.description: Block SOQL and SOSL query in the StepFunction's initRecordProcessing and finishRecordProcessing methods. The system will throw BoostException when the code will exceed provided limit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Block SOQL and SOSL query in the StepFunction's initRecordProcessing and finishRecordProcessing methods. The system will throw BoostException when the code will exceed provided limit.
CustomField.label: Block SOQL in record level processing
